oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Time budget and lying synchronisation of cows in conventional and automatic milking system departments
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Raussi, Satu
Saastamoinen, Seija
Kaihilahti, Jutta
Eriksson, Christian
Jauhiainen, Lauri
Hepola, Helena
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Animal husbandry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We compared the time budget and synchronised lying behaviour of cows in a conventional and in an automatic milking systems, both situating inside the same barn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Raussi, Satu; Saastamoinen, Seija; Kaihilahti, Jutta; Eriksson, Christian; Jauhiainen, Lauri and Hepola, Helena (2008) Time budget and lying synchronisation of cows in conventional and automatic milking system departments. In: Proceedings, International Society for Applied Ethology, p. 11.
